Vault","name":"","type":"address"}],"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"}],"devdoc":{"kind":"dev","methods":{"balanceOfUnderlying(address)":{"details":"May mutate the state of the Instrument by TODO need to incorporate the capital supplied by pool bond issuers","params":{"user":"The user to get the underlying balance of."},"returns":{"_0":"The user's Instrument balance in underlying tokens."}},"liquidateOwnership(address)":{"details":"assumes collateral has already been transferred to vault, needs to be checked by the caller "},"onMarketApproval(uint256,uint256)":{"params":{"quoted_yield":"is in notional amount denominated in underlying, which is the area between curve and 1 at the x-axis point  where area under curve is max_principal "}},"prepareWithdraw()":{"details":"prepareWithdraw->vault.beforeResolve->vault.resolveInstrument in separate txs"},"redeemUnderlying(uint256)":{"params":{"amount":"The amount of underlying tokens to withdraw."},"returns":{"_0":"An error code, or 0 if the withdrawal was successful."}}},"version":1},"userdoc":{"kind":"user","methods":{"Utilizer()":{"notice":"address of user who submits the liquidity proposal "},"balanceOfUnderlying(address)":{"notice":"Returns a user's Instrument balance in underlying tokens."},"beginGracePeriod()":{"notice":"callable by anyone "},"constructor":{"notice":"both _collateral and _oracle could be 0 address if fully uncollateralized or does not have a price oracle  param _notionalInterest and _principal is initialized as desired variables"},"depositCollateral(uint256)":{"notice":"borrower deposit promised collateral  "},"drawdown()":{"notice":"Allows a borrower to borrow on their creditline. This creditline allows only lump sum drawdowns, all approved principal needs to be borrowed which would start the interest timer "},"getCollateralRatio()":{"notice":"if collateral is liquidateable and has oracle, fetch value of collateral  and return ratio to principal "},"instrumentApprovalCondition()":{"notice":"validators have to check these conditions at a human level too before approving "},"interestToRepay()":{"notice":"borrower can see how much to repay now starting from last repayment time, also used to calculated how much interest to repay for the current principalOwed, which can be changed "},"liquidateOwnership(address)":{"notice":"After grace period auction off ownership to some other party and transfer the funds back to vault "},"onDefault()":{"notice":"should be called  at default by validators calling this function will go thorugh the necessary process to recoup bad debt, and will push the remaining funds to vault"},"prepareWithdraw()":{"notice":"checks whether the vault can withdraw and record profit from this instrument  for this instrument to resolve  For creditlines, all debts should be repaid for strategies, all assets should be divested + converted to Underlying this function is important in preventing manipulations, "},"pullRawFunds(uint256)":{"notice":"raw funds should not be harvested by the vault"},"pushCollateralToVault(uint256,address)":{"notice":"transfers collateral back to vault when default "},"readyForWithdrawal()":{"notice":"checks if the creditline is ready to be withdrawed, i.e all  loans have been paid, all non-underlying have been liquidated, etc"},"redeemUnderlying(uint256)":{"notice":"Withdraws a specific amount of underlying tokens from the Instrument."},"repay(uint256)":{"notice":"allows a borrower to repay their loan Standard repayment structure is repaying interest for the owed principal periodically and whenever principal is repayed interest owed is decreased proportionally "},"store_internal_balance()":{"notice":"called before resolve, to avoid calculating redemption price based on manipulations "}},"notice":"Contract for unsecured loans, each instance will be associated to a borrower+marketId approved borrowers will interact with this contract to borrow, repay.  and vault will supply principal and harvest principal/interest balanceOfUnderlying(address).details: May mutate the state of the Instrument by accruing interest. TODO need to incorporate the capital supplied by pool bond issuers

params.user: The user to get the underlying balance of.

returns._0: The user's Instrument balance in underlying tokens.

liquidateOwnership(address).details: assumes collateral has already been transferred to vault, needs to be checked by the caller

params.quoted_yield: is in notional amount denominated in underlying, which is the area between curve and 1 at the x-axis point  where area under curve is max_principal

params.amount: The amount of underlying tokens to withdraw.

returns._0: An error code, or 0 if the withdrawal was successful.

Utilizer().notice: address of user who submits the liquidity proposal

balanceOfUnderlying(address).notice: Returns a user's Instrument balance in underlying tokens.

constructor.notice: both _collateral and _oracle could be 0 address if fully uncollateralized or does not have a price oracle  param _notionalInterest and _principal is initialized as desired variables

drawdown().notice: Allows a borrower to borrow on their creditline. This creditline allows only lump sum drawdowns, all approved principal needs to be borrowed which would start the interest timer

getCollateralRatio().notice: if collateral is liquidateable and has oracle, fetch value of collateral  and return ratio to principal

instrumentApprovalCondition().notice: validators have to check these conditions at a human level too before approving

interestToRepay().notice: borrower can see how much to repay now starting from last repayment time, also used to calculated how much interest to repay for the current principalOwed, which can be changed

liquidateOwnership(address).notice: After grace period auction off ownership to some other party and transfer the funds back to vault

onDefault().notice: should be called  at default by validators calling this function will go thorugh the necessary process to recoup bad debt, and will push the remaining funds to vault

prepareWithdraw().notice: checks whether the vault can withdraw and record profit from this instrument  for this instrument to resolve  For creditlines, all debts should be repaid for strategies, all assets should be divested + converted to Underlying this function is important in preventing manipulations,

pullRawFunds(uint256).notice: raw funds should not be harvested by the vault

pushCollateralToVault(uint256,address).notice: transfers collateral back to vault when default

readyForWithdrawal().notice: checks if the creditline is ready to be withdrawed, i.e all  loans have been paid, all non-underlying have been liquidated, etc

redeemUnderlying(uint256).notice: Withdraws a specific amount of underlying tokens from the Instrument.

repay(uint256).notice: allows a borrower to repay their loan Standard repayment structure is repaying interest for the owed principal periodically and whenever principal is repayed interest owed is decreased proportionally

store_internal_balance().notice: called before resolve, to avoid calculating redemption price based on manipulations

documentation.text: @notice address of user who submits the liquidity proposal
@notice hooks for approval logic that are specific to each instrument type, called by controller for approval/default logic
@notice raw funds should not be harvested by the vault

@notice Free up returns for vault to pull,  checks if the instrument is ready to be withdrawed, i.e all 
 loans have been paid, all non-underlying have been liquidated, etc
@notice called before resolve, to avoid calculating redemption price based on manipulations
@notice Minimal interface for Vault compatible strategies.

@notice checks if the creditline is ready to be withdrawed, i.e all 
 loans have been paid, all non-underlying have been liquidated, etc

@notice if possible, and borrower defaults, liquidates given collateral to underlying
 and push back to vault. If not possible, push the collateral back to

@notice if collateral is liquidateable and has oracle, fetch value of collateral 
 and return ratio to principal

@notice After grace period auction off ownership to some other party and transfer the funds back to vault 
 @dev assumes collateral has already been transferred to vault, needs to be checked by the caller
@notice transfers collateral back to vault when default
@notice validators have to check these conditions at a human level too before approving
@notice borrower deposit promised collateral
@notice can only redeem collateral when debt is fully paid
@notice should only be called when (portion of) principal is repayed

@param quoted_yield is in notional amount denominated in underlying, which is the area between curve and 1 at the x-axis point 
 where area under curve is max_principal

@notice borrower can see how much to repay now starting from last repayment time, also used to calculated
 how much interest to repay for the current principalOwed, which can be changed

@notice updates balances after repayment
 need to remove min.
@notice callable by anyone
@notice when principal/interest owed becomes 0, need to find out if this is prepaid
@notice transfers ownership to borrower or any other party if necessary

@notice function that ownership delegators use to call functions 
 in their contract other than the transferFunction contract
